DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether DuPont Experimental Dietary Fibre product 1 2 digest use glycaemic insulinaemic response marker .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Three Fibres Glycaemic Insulinaemic Responses Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: DuPont Experimental Dietary Fibre product 1 2 glycaemic insulinaemic response compare polydextrose dextrose give adult healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: BMI 1827 kg/m2 . Selfdiagnosed healthy time recruitment , confirm medical questionnaire : report current previous metabolic diseases chronic gastrointestinal disorder . No blood donation study . Reported intense sporting activity < 10hr/w . Reported alcohol consumption ≤21 units/w ( female volunteer ) ≤28 units/w ( male volunteer ) . Feasibility give blood sample per study protocol . Informed consent sign Dislike , allergy intolerance test product . Fasting blood glucose level < 4.4 > 6.1 . Volunteer health condition would prevent him/her fulfil study requirement , put subject risk would confound interpretation study result judge Principal Investigator . Volunteer history diabetes high blood pressure . Having consume anything apart plain water twelve hour prior first test day . Volunteer and/or immediate family member employee investigational site directly affiliate study , sponsor clinical research organization . Reported lactating ( lactate < 6 week ago ) , pregnant ( pregnant < 3 month ago ) wish become pregnant study . Reported participation another biomedical trial 1 month start study .
